input.sentences: we visited the market in the city we were visiting on vacation .
i tried some fruits i had never tasted before .
i talked to some of the merchants .
the last night we decided to go on a date .
we went on a date on a river boat .
output.sentences: We visited a market when we were visiting the island on vacation.
We talked to some friendly merchants.
At night, we decided to go on a date.
We went out on the river on a boat for our date.
